title: Crypto investment products see first outflows of the year amid Bitcoin’s ‘very high trading volumes’
description:
Crypto-related investment products experienced their first outflow for this year, totaling $21 million, according to CoinShares’ latest weekly report. The downturn coincided with an unprecedented surge in trading activity among Bitcoin products, reaching a staggering $11.8 billion last week. This remarkable volume was seven times higher than the average weekly volume recorded in the previous […]

The post Crypto investment products see first outflows of the year amid Bitcoin’s ‘very high trading volumes’ appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BITCOIN PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (January 22) – Bitcoin Resumes Bearish After A Brief Relief, Is $40,000 Next The Target?
description: Bitcoin went through a serious decline in the past weeks after testing a two-year high earlier this month. It has shown no signs of stopping yet as it may witness a bigger bloodbath in the upcoming weeks.  Last weekend came with a small relief for BTC after losing momentum throughout […]

title: FTX’s Alameda Research withdraws Grayscale lawsuit
description: FTX’s sister company, Alameda Research, willingly dismissed litigation action against Digital Currency Group’s Grayscale Investments shortly after spot BTC ETF approval.
